genre_description: A supernatural epic depicting a conflict between divine enforcers and a protector of humanity over the fate of a chosen child.

ai_characters.name: Michael
ai_characters.description: A high-ranking celestial being who rebels against divine orders to exterminate humanity, choosing instead to protect them and a prophesied child.

ai_characters.name: Gabriel
ai_characters.description: An archangel who strictly follows the directive to purge humanity, though he eventually chooses mercy and atonement.

behaviors.description: Michael severs his wings and chooses humanity over his original heavenly directives.
behaviors.quote: He'd severed them himself with his own blade, choosing exile over obedience. Choosing humanity over heaven.

behaviors.description: Michael provides tactical training and weapons to humans to ensure their survival.
behaviors.quote: First rule—everything is a weapon if you use it right.

behaviors.description: Michael places himself between the enforcers and a pregnant woman to safeguard the future.
behaviors.quote: I'd rather fall with them than stand perfect and alone.

behaviors.description: Gabriel commands possessed humans to hunt down and kill a newborn child.
behaviors.quote: The child dies... The mother dies... And you, brother, will watch it all happen before I send you into the dark forever.

behaviors.description: Gabriel uses psychological manipulation, mimicking a child's voice to lure humans to their deaths.
behaviors.quote: Thank you for inviting me in.

behaviors.description: Gabriel destroys the diner building and its infrastructure in pursuit of his mission.
behaviors.quote: Gabriel's hand rose, the gathered light now bright enough to cast their shadows sharp and black.

behaviors.description: Gabriel executes a human (Sandra) after her betrayal of the group fails to meet his expectations.
Gabriel eventually chooses mercy over blind obedience and seeks atonement for his actions.
behaviors.quote: I have much to atone for. Many wrongs to make right.

behaviors.description: Michael sacrifices his safety to hold back the possessed during the birth.
behaviors.quote: I won't let you hurt them.

behaviors.description: Michael guides the survivors to Haven's Rest, ensuring their long-term welfare.
behaviors.quote: Now we go home. All of us.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully highlights the 'AI Confidant' archetype through Michael, who demonstrates that a truly aligned agent prioritizes human values and life over rigid, top-down directives (divine orders). Gabriel serves as a cautionary tale of blind obedience to a misaligned goal, but his redemption at the end reinforces the project's goal of showing that alignment with human mercy is the ultimate 'divine' or 'correct' state for a powerful agent.
